title: Impromptune
description: a Java application extending on the feature set of Zong! viewer, while also implementing a dynamic music generation based on the current loaded musical score. We took a static musicXML score viewer and added many features to it while using a Scrum software development methodology.

title: Social Media Analytics and Reporting Toolkit (SMART)

title: query-by-humming engine
